name: Prashant Singh
body:
# Hi.
I just make video games using [Unit3D Engine](https://www.unity3d.com). I am working on an IT company as a full time video game developer.
I am recently taking interest in [Editor Scripting](https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/ExtendingTheEditor.html) that will take a little time to write the code and then saves a lot of your time and you can focus on the main part of the project.

I like to share my work and my codes for free I haven't shared any of my developed games source code because of my current company's policy.

I will share my games[with source code] if I develop some in my free time. And I also know some of the [Scriptable Objects](https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/ScriptableObject.html).

### Authors and Contributors
Me and my friends Harshit (@notrorschach) and [Sreejit](https://www.facebook.com/PillaiSreejit) work together in a IT company as game developers.

# Support or Contact
If you get stuck with my code or want to follow up you can follow me on [twitter](https://www.twitter.com/_prashantsingh_) or email me on [hi@prashantsingh.xyz](mailto:hi@prashantsingh.xyz?Subject=From%20Github).

Peace!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
